amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the provisions exempting public companies with less than $75 million in market capitalization from the requirements of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act relating to the external audit of internal controls.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 111-370 to strike the provisions exempting public companies with less than $75 million in market capitalization from the requirements of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act related to the external audit of internal controls.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kanjorski amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 153 - 271 (Roll no. 960).
